metadata.title: CVE-2023-3500 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionsstarting from 10.0 before 16.0.8, all versions starting from 16.1 before16.1.3, all versions starting from 16.2 before 16.2.2. A reflected XSS waspossible when creating specific PlantUML diagrams that allowed the attackerto perform arbitrary actions on behalf of victims.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
